pages.text: $(item)Schematica$() is a mod that can help you construct complicated $(item)Multiblock Structures.$()$(br2)Most of the multiblocks that are used in this modpack have a $(item)Schematica entry.$()$(br2)You can access those entries with the $(item)Load Schematic$() keybind.

pages.title: Current Keybinds
pages.text: $(br)Load schematic: $(item)$(k:schematica.key.load)$()$(br)Manipulate schematic: $(item)$(k:schematica.key.control)$()$(br2)Once you've loaded the $(item)Schematic$() you can use the manipulate keybind to move the multiblock around, look at the required materials and finally assemble the multiblock.
